input.sentences: the funeral for the fallen officer was very somber .
his casket was carried out from the church by his co-workers .
they were all in uniform trying not to cry .
the whole police force was present to honor them .
the priest was thanked by everyone for his final farewell .
output.sentences: It was a somber day at the funeral of an officer
The workers lined the church as his casket passed.
Even those in uniform started to cry.
The police force came together to honor the fallen.
They thanked the priest  after the final ceremony.
